results.title: Association of Circulating Ketone Bodies With Functional Outcomes After ST-Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction.
results.text_hl: (Metabolic Modulation With @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ to Reduce @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@Heart Failure@@@ After @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Acute Myocardial Infarction@@@: Glycometabolic Intervention as Adjunct to Primary Coronary Intervention in @DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction@@@ (GIPS-@<m>DISEASE_Rufous_oculocutaneous_albinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537189 @@@III@@@): a Randomized Controlled Trial; NCT01217307).

results.title: Metformin plus temozolomide-based chemotherapy as adjuvant treatment for WHO grade III and IV malignant gliomas.
